Context: The Sally Horsfall Eaton School of Nursing at George Brown College offers certificate, diploma, and degree programs in nursing. The school is located at the Waterfront Campus and uses a Simulation Centre for practical learning. Each program is science- and biology-based and includes clinical placements. The Entry Advising service helps students match their skills and career goals with program options. Information sessions are held to answer questions about programs, and tours of classrooms, labs, and facilities are available. Contact the college at 416-415-2000 or TTY: 1-877-515-5559, or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca for more information. The college's social media hub can also be visited. Program offerings and fees are subject to change without notice.
